name: Society for the upliftment of the Economically Backward (SUEB)
briefDescription: SUEB works in Tamilnadu and Kolhapur. We form Self Help Groups and train the women to save and lend among themselves.  We also assist them to get loans from  Commercial Banks  for Micro Enterprises and Farming activities.  Through ICICI Bank , during  2012 to 2013 we have disbursed 2 Crores  worth loans to poor village women to improve their businesses and income. We conduct a number of  Micro Enterprise Development Training Programmes, to teach vocational skills and improve the income of the women. We give training to the farmers to increase production and income.  We run community colleges for the school dropouts and aspiring youth. We work for the  welfare of  the differently abled ( handicapped) and assist them in getting all the benefits from the Government.
